subject: CNN Student News 2006-2007 Survey
body:
CNN.com - Student News

    



 


 





As we approach the end of the year, we'd like to thank you for your interest in CNN Student News, CNN  Classroom Edition, and CNN.com/EDUCATION. We are dedicated to providing today's top news and compelling curriculum resources, and hope you continue to enjoy using our program in your classroom. 

Feedback from you, the educator, plays a role in shaping how we present news and curriculum. We'd greatly appreciate it if you took a few minutes to fill out a brief survey to let us know how we're doing and what you'd like to see in the future. 
Please click here to take the survey. 
Thanks, and enjoy the summer. Sincerely,CNN Student News
